## Quarto

Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see <https://quarto.org>.

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
mtcars |>
  select(cyl, mpg) |>
ggplot(aes(cyl, mpg)) +
  geom_point() +
  sdtools::theme_sd()
```

## Quarto

Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see <https://quarto.org>.

```{r}
#| echo: true
#| eval: false
mtcars <- mtcars |>
  select(cyl, mpg)

ggplot(mtcars, aes(cyl, mpg)) +
  geom_point() +
  sdtools::theme_sd()
```
